CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix in the unaffected media. Don't forget to use 'media' meta controls, too!
CONTROLS.NAME: normal_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix in the edge detection effect, modified by controls in 'edge detect'.
CONTROLS.NAME: edge_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix in the rgb split effect, modified by controls in 'rgb split'.
CONTROLS.NAME: rgb_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix in the pixelate effect, modified by controls in 'pixelate'.
CONTROLS.NAME: pixelate_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix in the feedback effect. Needs other channels. Try edge detect to get extra trippy!
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Subtracts the normal video, instead of adding, for darker looks.
CONTROLS.NAME: subtract

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Edge detection tends to make colors pure R, G, B, this readjusts them to the original media.
CONTROLS.NAME: expand

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Expands and duplicates the edges.
CONTROLS.NAME: color_fix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: desc
CONTROLS.NAME: split_amount

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass-reactive RGB split effect. Toggle OFF for non-reactive.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_split

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Channels constantly move in a chaotic way, instead of orderly.
CONTROLS.NAME: woozy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Affects how fast the 'woozy' effect will run.
CONTROLS.NAME: woozy_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Simple, square pixels. Turn OFF to use other pixel types.
CONTROLS.NAME: square_pix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Triangular pixels. Turn OFF to use other pixel types.
CONTROLS.NAME: tri_pix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Circular pixels. Turn OFF to use other pixel types.
CONTROLS.NAME: circle_pix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Size of the pixels while mix on the pixelate effect is turned up.
CONTROLS.NAME: pixel_size

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Helps limit white-out/black-out, but modifies how some feedback behaves.
CONTROLS.NAME: clamp_color

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Additive instead of mixing. Turn up for extra echoes and a more pronounced effect.
CONTROLS.NAME: extra_bright

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: XY offset for feedback.
CONTROLS.NAME: fb_motion

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Zoom in/out offset for feedback.
CONTROLS.NAME: fb_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotational offset for feedback.
CONTROLS.NAME: fb_rotate
